data.message: He is and will be the most prolific artist of our time. Making a rap song as significant as the most intrinsic van Gough painting...an artist under appreciated AND misunderstood by many, but revered by the realest. I will always respect you Em, both my parents are dead I have no family except my fiancé and my baby on the way, but this just made my sad mother's day alil better thank u.

replies.message: Wow you just summed up Eminem's entire career in one paragraph. Very well said.
